attributes.action: force civic waste sites to remove and publicly sell all viable goods for reuse in centres.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
So much stuff is thrown away these days, and much of it fully working or just in need of repair such as computers, prams, electrical items.
Most civic sites only recycle by crushing and destroying goods that can be directly reused, and this is a wasteful and pointless exercise.
Please sign this petition for the rest of UK to follow the example of recyclers in cornwall who have set up local shops for the cheap resale of this 'jumble' to the public - it is very popular here.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "force civic waste sites to remove and publicly sell all viable goods for reuse in centres."
